mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT challenge_dt, weekday(challenge_dt) work_day, @rownum:=@rownum+1 work_th FROM (SELECT ADDDATE(#{challenge.stt_dt},t4*10000 + t3*1000 + t2*100 + t1*10 + t0) challenge_dt FROM (SELECT 0 t0 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t0, (SELECT 0 t1 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t1, (SELECT 0 t2 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t2, (SELECT 0 t3 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t3, (SELECT 0 t4 UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9) t4) v1 WHERE challenge_dt BETWEEN #{challenge.stt_dt} AND IF(now()<#{challenge.end_dt}, now(), #{challenge.end_dt}) AND LOCATE(weekday(challenge_dt),#{challenge.days})>0 AND (@rownum:=0)=0) s LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM workout WHERE cno = #{challenge.cno} AND email = #{email}) w ON s.challenge_dt = w.work_dt
